Oxford theme palettes from visual identity guidelines

Source: R/oxford_palettes.R
oxford_palette.Rd

Oxford theme palettes from visual identity guidelines

Oxford base map palettes

Usage

oxford_theme_palettes()

oxford_brewer_palettes()

Examples

oxford_theme_palettes()
#> $heritage
#> [1] "#994636" "#E08D79" "#C4A29E" "#A0AF84" "#426A5A"
#> 
#> $contemporary
#> [1] "#FE615A" "#ED9390" "#E4F0EF" "#789E9E" "#00AAB4"
#> 
#> $celebratory
#> [1] "#15616D" "#776885" "#E2C044" "#D4CDF4" "#7F055F"
#> 
#> $corporate
#> [1] "#FB5607" "#B9D6F2" "#95C11F" "#49B6FF" "#1D42A6"
#> 
#> $innovative
#> [1] "#65E5AE" "#F7EF66" "#15616D" "#D4CDF4" "#E6007E"
#>
